description:
Ritsuka Tachibana has always been a good student, so she is completely shocked when she is suddenly summoned by the student council. And that's only the beginning; from there, her life is turned upside down as her mother gets kidnapped and Ritsuka gets drawn into a world of vampires and devils. Both groups are searching for the "Grimoire," a forbidden item allowing its owner to rule the world.

(Source: IMDB)
synonyms: ダンス ウィズ デビルス

tags.name: Musical Theater
tags.description: Features a performance that combines songs, spoken dialogue, acting, and dance.

tags.name: Male Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several male characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.name: Vampire
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a vampire.

tags.name: Primarily Male Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of male characters.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: School Club
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a school club scene.

tags.name: Kuudere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: Yandere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is obsessively in love with another, to the point of acting deranged or violent.

tags.name: Idol
tags.description: Centers around the life and activities of an idol.

node.description:
__[Profile (Aria Entertainment)](https://www.ariamusic.co.jp/elements-garden/)__

A Japanese group of music composers, or a "music production brand" as they call themselves. They generally produce music for video games, anime and recording artists. They are attached to Aria Entertainment.

__Current Members:__ 
[Noriyasu Agematsu](https://anilist.co/staff/103633/Noriyasu-Agematsu) (Producer/Lyricist/Composer)
[Junpei Fujita](https://anilist.co/staff/110557/Junpei-Fujita) (Producer/Composer/Arranger)
[Hitoshi Fujima](https://anilist.co/staff/101273/Hitoshi-Fujima) (Composer/Arranger)
[Daisuke Kikuta](https://anilist.co/staff/147815/Daisuke-Kikuta) (Composer/Arranger)
[Seima Iwahashi](https://anilist.co/staff/146530/Seima-Iwahashi) (Composer/Arranger/Director)
[Ryutaro Fujinaga](https://anilist.co/staff/155960/Ryutaro-Fujinaga) (Lyricist/Composer)
[Ryota Tomaru](https://anilist.co/staff/140532/Ryota-Tomaru) (Composer/Arranger)
[Yuta Kasai](https://anilist.co/staff/259881/Yuuta-Kasai) (Composer/Arranger)
[Yusuke Takeda](https://anilist.co/staff/156645/Yusuke-Takeda) (Lyricist/Composer)
[Asuka Oda](https://anilist.co/staff/155968/Asuka-Oda) (Lyricist)
[Seima Kondou](https://anilist.co/staff/239286/Seima-Kondou) (Composer/Arranger)

__Former Members:__ 
Yasutomo Nakai (2005-2006)
[Masato Nakayama](https://anilist.co/staff/112097/Masato-Nakayama) (2007-2013)
[Evan Call](https://anilist.co/staff/119999/Evan-Call) (2012-2016)
Tomohiro Kita (2011-2016), Haruki Mori (2009-2018)
[Ryouta Suemasu](https://anilist.co/staff/155969/Ryouta-Suemasu) (2014-2019)
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Kameari_Kanata)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/maeda_rejet) | [Blog](https://berniniego.exblog.jp/)

Maeda Hirotaka is a Japanese art director, manga artist and illustrator. He currently works for Rejet.

(Source: vndb)

[Blog](http://daisukeiwasaki.blog22.fc2.com/) | [Twitter](https://x.com/Iwasaki_Rejet) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/id_rejet/) | [Wiki (JP)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E5%B2%A9%E5%B4%8E%E5%A4%A7%E4%BB%8B)

The managing director of otome company Rejet.

[Blog](http://daisukeiwasaki.blog22.fc2.com/) | [Twitter](https://x.com/Iwasaki_Rejet) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/id_rejet/) | [Wiki (JP)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E5%B2%A9%E5%B4%8E%E5%A4%A7%E4%BB%8B)

The managing director of otome company Rejet.

__Height:__ 171 cm  
__Interests:__ Film appreciation  
__Abilities:__ Mimicking chirps of small birds
__Awards:__ Best Male Rookie at 2nd Seiyuu Awards (2008)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/hatano_official) | [Website](https://hatanowataru.dive2ent.com/)

__Height:__ 169.6cm (5"7')
__Agent:__ 81 Produce

__[Website](https://www.saitosoma.com/) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/somasaito/) | [Profile (81produce)](https://www.81produce.co.jp/dcms_plusdb/index.php/item?cell003=%E3%81%95%E8%A1%8C&label=1&cell004=&name=%E6%96%89%E8%97%A4%E3%80%80%E5%A3%AE%E9%A6%AC&id=47) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/SomaStaff)__

He started his singing career in 2017. Named Best Rookie Actor at the 9th Seiyu Awards (2015) and won the Singing Award at the 16th Seiyu Awards (2021).

**Non-anime roles:**
~!• [Chongyun](https://anilist.co/character/233899/Chongyun) - Genshin Impact (VG)!~

__Height:__ 183 cm (6 ft 0 in)

[Profile](https://www.atomicmonkey.jp/jp/archives/talent/kimurasubaru) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/GiantSUBAru) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/richpotatoboya/?hl=en)

A German–Japanese actor, voice actor and narrator affiliated with talent agency [Atomic Monkey](http://www.atomicmonkey.jp/jp/), his best-known role is voicing Takeshi Goda in the Doraemon series, which has spawned numerous specials.

__Height:__ 171 cm  
__Interests:__ Film appreciation  
__Abilities:__ Mimicking chirps of small birds
__Awards:__ Best Male Rookie at 2nd Seiyuu Awards (2008)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/hatano_official) | [Website](https://hatanowataru.dive2ent.com/)

__Height:__ 173 cm

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/ta2hisa_suzuki) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/ta2hisa_suzuki/)

Tatsuhisa is a Japanese voice actor and singer, and he is affiliated with I'm Enterprise and Lantis. He is the vocalist of the rock band [OLDCODEX](https://anilist.co/staff/112151/OLDCODEX) under his stage name Ta_2, who also provides the opening/ending themes of many of the anime he stars in. He not only sings but also composes some of the songs. He also belongs to Style Five, in charge of the endings of Free! He also likes bicycling, karaoke, reading and video games. 

He is known for his numerous roles in anime series, his main breakout roles in the West were as Takao in Kuroko no Basuke and especially as Makoto Tachibana in Free!. He is not only known for his voice in anime, but also in video games. For example, he gave voice to Noctis (FFXV) and Alfonse (FEH). 

He is married to the famous singer [LiSA](https://anilist.co/staff/105561/LiSA). In late July 2021, it was reported that he was involved in an affair with a 20-year old fan. The next month he announced that he would suspend all entertainment activities due to poor health, later issuing an apology for his "irresponsible and inappropriate actions". His agency stated that he would gradually resume activities while recovering. In March 2022, his agency announced his full return to work from hiatus, along with another apology to fans.

__Height:__ 167cm 
__Hobbies:__ Snowboarding  

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/DH_official__)

**Non-Anime Roles**:
• Sampo (Honkai: Star Rail)
• Cael (Lovebrush Chronicles)

__Height:__ 161 cm (5'3")

 [Twitter](https://twitter.com/iRis_a_himi) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/himika_akaneya_official/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCwCfG7UHT9jubtG1M5dH4Bw) | [Profile (81 Produce)](https://www.81produce.co.jp/actor_search/index.php/item?id=149) | [Profile (i☆Ris)](https://iris.dive2ent.com/profile/member.php?id=1000227)


A Japanese voice actress and singer. She's currently a member of the idol group [i☆Ris](https://anilist.co/staff/131442).

**Non-Anime Roles:**
- Olorun - Genshin Impact (VG)

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/近藤隆)
Married to [Masashi Sogo](https://anilist.co/staff/107529/).

Scriptwriter and production manager affiliated with [Lapin Track](https://anilist.co/studio/6213/Lapin-Track). Originating as a production manager for [Brain's Base](https://anilist.co/studio/112/Brains-Base) before slowly transitioning into a scriptwriter under them.

Founder of animation studio Lapin Track alongside [Masakazu Watanabe](https://anilist.co/staff/148153/Masakazu-Watanabe).
[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/金春智子)

Originating from [Madhouse](https://anilist.co/studio/11/). Known to prescore his works.

Studied under [Satoshi Kon](https://anilist.co/staff/99580/) on [JoJo's Bizarre Adventure](https://anilist.co/anime/666/), [Perfect Blue](https://anilist.co/anime/437/) and [Millenium Actress](https://anilist.co/anime/1033/).
**Michiko Yokote** is a Japanese scriptwriter. She is the pupil of [Kazunori Itou](https://anilist.co/staff/97941).
Known to be a fast and efficient worker. Often directing multiple works at a time.
